story: Amir Abou Eesa shared a link to the group: Egyptian Geeks.
name: How to protect cefsharp, HTML5 apps build with .net and visual studio installer
caption: stackoverflow.com
description: I built an app based on CefSharp with .Net and visual studio, now i need to publish this app as installer , sure the published MSI when installed on client it has the html and javascript file, how i

data.message:
My 2 cents (sorry, I have strict time to give you full solution right now)
- embed the HTML and JS files as resources in the assembly and read them as streams. Still, extracting the resources may be doable by decomping the assemblies, then...
- always ever combine and minfy your js files, and obfuscate your .NET assemblies
You may save the files on disk as encrypted files with unknown extensions, and decrypt them at runtime, but still the memory may be accessible, but you are raising the bar!
Sameh Serag Deabes Thanks a lot.
